title: What A Tortoise Can Teach You About Your Career
dc:creator: Tracy Brinkmann | Personal Development in the spirit of Tony Robbins, Napoleon Hill, & Zig Ziglar
description:

If youâ€™re trying to become an overnight sensation, you may switch your focus a more long-term career success instead. Artists of all types who gradually develop up a following tend to have far higher sales and way more loyal fan base than those who "skyrocket" to fame. Â In the same sense, regardless of your field, it always pays to slow down, zero in and focus on moving forward steadily, like the tortoise, when it comes to your career. Discover valuable insights with the ideas in this episode! - CLICK & LISTEN then LIKE & SHARE!
